parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To send up (to a higher tribunal), send back. From ana and pempo; to send up or back.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Neuter 1st Person Plural
str2: My, mine. From the oblique cases of ego; my.
Probably strengthened from splen; an intestine; figuratively, pity or sympathy.
